statements: DELETE FROM passengers WHERE first_name = 'Alice' AND last_name = 'Smith';
DELETE FROM flights WHERE flight_id = 2001 AND departure_date = '2022-05-10';
DELETE FROM flights WHERE flight_number = 'ABC123' AND departure_time < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM passengers WHERE passenger_id = '7890' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM reservations WHERE reservation_id = '1234' AND booking_status = 'confirmed';
DELETE FROM flights WHERE departure_city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE ticket_class = 'Economy' AND seat_number = 'A12';
